meta.title: Mush'ab Abdurrahman Fathin | Fullstack Web Developer
meta.description: A passionate IT student and Fullstack Web Developer crafting elegant digital experiences with modern technologies.

hero.name: Mush'ab Abdurrahman Fathin
hero.headline: Build fast, clean, business-ready websites.
hero.subheadline: Mush'ab Abdurrahman Fathin · Fullstack Web Developer · 3rd-semester IT student
hero.bio: I help HR teams and clients ship modern web apps—from landing pages and admin dashboards to CRUD systems—focused on performance, maintainability, and a polished user experience.
hero.photoAlt: Profile photo of Mush'ab Abdurrahman Fathin

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know who I am
about.bio:
I'm Mush'ab Abdurrahman Fathin, a 3rd-semester IT student focused on web development. I build websites and web systems using PHP/JavaScript with clean UI and reliable fundamentals.

I've worked on projects such as "syareapreneur.site" (sharia financing/loan website), "smaibnuaqil.my.id" (student admission/PPDB site), and a simple Linktree-style personal page for branding.

I enjoy translating requirements into clear features: forms, validations, databases, admin panels, and responsive pages.
about.goalsText: Apply for fullstack roles, take freelance projects, and strengthen personal branding.
about.audienceText: HR/recruiters, non-technical clients, technical clients/developers, and the general public.
about.skillsSubtitle: My core stack and tools I use most.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work

syareapreneur.title: Syareapreneur.site
syareapreneur.description: A sharia financing/loan website for applications, verification, and data management.
syareapreneur.longDescription: A web application to manage a sharia-based loan workflow. Includes information pages, application forms, input validation, database storage, and a basic admin flow to review and process submissions.

smaibnuaqil.title: smaibnuaqil.my.id (Admissions)
smaibnuaqil.description: Student admission website with forms, document uploads, and an admin panel.
smaibnuaqil.longDescription: A lightweight admissions system: applicants fill forms, upload documents, and track status. Admins can review registrants, verify submissions, and manage displayed information.

linktree.title: Linktree-style Personal Page
linktree.description: A personal branding page to introduce myself and route visitors to key links.
linktree.longDescription: A clean, lightweight website to display a short bio, social links, and primary CTAs—ideal for quick portfolio sharing and personal branding.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Building responsive, performant, and accessible user interfaces using React, Next.js, Vue, and modern CSS frameworks.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Creating robust APIs and server-side applications with Node.js, Laravel, and database management.

fullstack.title: Fullstack Solutions
fullstack.description: End-to-end web application development from concept to deployment, including maintenance and support.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision. Feel free to reach out!

footer.tagline: Crafting digital experiences with passion and precision.
